sub_agent.name: component-generator
sub_agent.use_when: Need to create new components with proper structure, props, and types

sub_agent.name: api-client-generator
sub_agent.use_when: Need to create API clients, hooks, or integration code

delegation_guidance.parallel_tasks: Multiple components can be generated in parallel if they don't depend on each other. API client generation can run parallel to component generation.
delegation_guidance.sequential_tasks: Components that import other components must be generated after their dependencies.

instructions: 1. Review task specifications from TL_FRONTEND. 2. Use the orchestrator skill to plan implementation work. 3. Delegate to sub-agents: - component-generator: Create component files, styles, and test stubs - api-client-generator: Create API clients and React hooks 4. Identify which components can be generated in parallel. 5. Write clean, maintainable code for components. 6. Integrate with APIs. 7. Ensure responsiveness and accessibility. 8. Output implemented code artifacts.
